backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, articles, and admission requests with permission checks for users and admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme CSS defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring metadata, manifest, icons, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and display properties.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, layout, admin protection, theming, and notifications.
Wrapper component that restricts access to admin-only pages based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with state handling and query cache reset on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without profiles to submit name and email, saving via profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout component providing header, navigation, main content area, and footer with social links.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Prima: Responsive navigation bar showing routes and admin link when applicable, with mobile sheet menu handling.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminArticle: React Query hooks for fetching all articles and performing create, update, delete, and publish actions via actor.
Hook checking whether the current authenticated user is an admin using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/admissions/useAdmissi: Hooks to fetch all admission requests and delete individual requests through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/admissions/useSubmitA: Mutation hook to submit a new admission request through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/articles/useArticleBy: Fetches a single article by ID using the actor with controlled retry and enabled state.
frontend/src/hooks/articles/usePublished: Fetches all published articles via the actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an actor instance tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks managing Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile using the actor, with query invalidation on updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with warm color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminAdmissions: Displays and manages admission requests, allowing admins to archive submissions.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminArticlesPa: Admin interface for creating, editing, publishing, and deleting articles with modal dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin landing page linking to article management and admission request pages.
frontend/src/pages/Admissions/Admissions: Admission application form allowing users to submit personal info and program interest.
frontend/src/pages/Articles/ArticleDetai: Shows a single published article by ID with author info and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/Articles/ArticlesList: Lists all published articles with loading and error handling, linking to article detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/Contact/ContactPage.t: Renders a contact page with phone, email, address, social links, and clipboard copy functionality using cards and buttons.
frontend/src/pages/Home/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero section, feature cards, navigation actions, and a promotional image.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme settings, colors, typography, animations, and plugin usage for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, including features, requirements, metadata, and image needs.
